评论详情: I am so happy with this top! I sized up for a more loose fitting and oversized top versus it being super cropped and I am so glad that I did. The drink glasses blend in with the material of the rest of the shirt, they don't look liike plastic or shiny compared to the rest of the top which I think looks much nicer and more expensive for a top like this. This is such a cute, comfortable and unique baby tee!

评论概述: Cute idea, not the best execution
类型: Size: MediumColor: Tree Martini Wine Beige
评论详情: The material of the shirt I got is super soft but on the thinner side. I would say definitely size up if you don't want it to be overly cropped. I got a medium and the sleeves are a little too tight. The idea of the graphic is so cute, love the 3 martinis. However the execution of the graphic on the tee is a little janky, when you're up close to it you can tell that it's kind of blurry and the details get lost. From far away it's cute though.

The material is a type of material I would never have imagined. The image printed on the shirt looks great but the material used ruined it honestly. Price point may be a little steep for what you get. It’s also very very cropped. I would probably give 2.5 stars if possible
